newsitem.title: USA: Kansas feedlot cattle fairly active at $71 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Kansas feedlot cattle fairly active at $71 - USDA.

text.p: Trade was fairly active, USDA said. Slaughter steers and heifers steady. Inquiry good, demand fair early, light by late morning.

Sales confirmed on 16,300 slaughter steers and 9,300 slaughter heifers Thursday. For the week to date 47,700 head confirmed including 8,800 head or about 18 percent previously contracted or formulated cattle.
Sales FOB feedlot net weights after 4 percent shrink.
Slaughter steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1150-1275 lbs
71.00, few 1225- 1250 lbs including brahma cross 70.50. Pen
Select and Choice 2-3 1350 lb dressed basis 113.50.
Slaughter heifers - Select and Choice 2-3 1020-1150 lbs
71.00; few mixed Commercial to Choice 1000 lb heifers and
Wk to date - 47,700 week ago - 61,600 year ago - 88,000
